name: Albanian Empire
startIntroPart1: The President, Prime Minister and the King of Albania, Can you bring us joy and glory?.
startIntroPart2: O' Great leader of Albania, we should rise once more! After the Ottomans destroyed our peaceful nation!
declaringWar: You are nothing but a nuisance to this world! Shqiperia will not tolerate your childish acts!
defeated: The last bastion of Great Nation of Albania has fallen to your hands, well done. But if you think I will surrender to you, I would rather prefer to blow my brains out.
introduction: I am the President, Prime Minister and the King of Albania, Zog the First. Nice to meet you. But if you crossed the line between us, I will make you choke a fishbone
tradeRequest: Albania will thank you if you accepted our trade request.
